Articles.Content:
Saftey. Integrity. Performance.

Those three words mean a lot to me, and today I would like to share with you an aircraft that meets and exceeds the meaning of all three of them. Today, I would like to introduce you to the future of VSTOL aircraft. I would like to welcome the K-12 Kardinal.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/0txM6)

**A craft file will be available shortly.** 

Mods used:

BahamutoDynamics Armory

BahamutoDynamics Adjustable Landing Gear

Infernal Robotics with model rework

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-12T02:38:32Z" title="07/12/2015 02:38  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 12, 2015</time> by SpaceToad**
  
Added imgur tags. :/ part 2
You're supposed to use these ] and [ when doing an imgur BB code.
Yeah... Just figured that out. Thanks anyway.

> 
> Yeah... Just figured that out. Thanks anyway.

No problem!

I wouldn't feel very safe if my aerospace company spelled safety wrong

CP,Sorry for being a grammar .... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Saftey

Is that why it jettisons the engines before landing?
